en:
There are two flight modes to use.

You could use raw input, this will give you full control of the ship. But you need to counter forces like rotation and acceleration yourself.

As an alternative you could use the flight computer. It will try to ensure that you stay on course by interpreting your inputs. If you stop with input commands it will try to stop your ship.

You can switch those modes as you like while playing.
de:
There are two flight modes to use.

You could use raw input, this will give you full control of the ship. But you need to counter forces like rotation and acceleration yourself.

As an alternative you could use the flight computer. It will try to ensure that you stay on course by interpreting your inputs. If you stop with input commands it will try to stop your ship.

You can switch those modes as you like while playing.

en:
Fly through the crosses.

For this training level you won't be able to leave this screen.
To see the controls, press the help button in the top right corner.
de:
Fly through the crosses.

For this training level you won't be able to leave this screen.
To see the controls, press the help button in the top right corner.

en: Firing your weapons will try to fire all your active hardpoints at once to the front direction of your ship
de: Firing your weapons will try to fire all your active hardpoints at once to the front direction of your ship

en: You did fly through the last target. Thank you for playing.\n\nPlease leave a comment, what you think about the flight model
